title: PHPglobalKeyword

metadata.description: Learn about PHPglobalKeyword with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Use a global variable in a function:
<?php
$x = 5;
function add($y) {
global $x;
return $x + $y;
}
echo "$x + 5 is " . add(5);
?>

Definition and Usage
The
global
keyword imports variables from the global scope into the local scope of a
function.
